entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 10 February 2023
